recipe_metadata.title: Research Automation System - Universal Digital Twin System

recipe_overview.description: Advanced research automation system for automated knowledge gathering, literature review, source validation, and intelligent synthesis. This recipe implements comprehensive research capabilities including web scraping, academic database integration, source credibility assessment, automated synthesis, and intelligent archiving with metadata extraction.
recipe_overview.architectural_scope: Complete research automation platform with web scraping, academic integration, source validation, intelligent synthesis, and automated archiving capabilities

technology_stack.academic_databases: PubMed, arXiv, IEEE, ACM, Google Scholar APIs
technology_stack.synthesis_engine: NLP, summarization, relationship extraction, knowledge graphs
technology_stack.archiving: ArchiveBox, Wayback Machine, local storage with metadata
technology_stack.ai_integration: OpenAI GPT, local LLMs, embedding models, vector search
technology_stack.data_processing: Pandas, NumPy, spaCy, NLTK for text analysis

deliverables: Automated web scraping with intelligent content extraction
Academic database integration with API connectors
Source credibility assessment and validation system
Automated literature review and gap analysis
Knowledge graph construction and relationship mapping
success_criteria: Web scraping functional across diverse content types
Academic database APIs integrated and operational
Source validation system accurately assessing credibility
Automated archiving preserving all research materials
Performance benchmarks met under research load

system_requirements.network: High-speed internet for web scraping and API access

tasks.title: Web Scraping Infrastructure Setup
tasks.description: Establish comprehensive web scraping infrastructure with multiple engines, proxy management, rate limiting, and intelligent content extraction capabilities.

tasks.title: Academic Database Integration
tasks.description: Integrate major academic databases and APIs including PubMed, arXiv, IEEE, ACM, and Google Scholar with authentication and rate limiting.

tasks.title: Source Validation System
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive source validation with credibility scoring, fact-checking algorithms, and cross-referencing capabilities.

tasks.title: Intelligent Synthesis Engine
tasks.description: Create advanced content synthesis engine with NLP, summarization, relationship extraction, and knowledge graph construction.

tasks.title: Automated Literature Review
tasks.description: Implement automated literature review system with gap analysis, trend identification, and research direction recommendations.

tasks.title: Knowledge Graph Construction
tasks.description: Build dynamic knowledge graph system with relationship mapping, entity extraction, and semantic reasoning capabilities.

tasks.title: Comprehensive Archiving System
tasks.description: Create automated archiving system with metadata preservation, version control, and intelligent storage optimization.

tasks.title: Research Workflow Automation
tasks.description: Implement automated research workflows with scheduling, task management, and progress tracking capabilities.

tasks.title: Citation Management System
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive citation management with bibliography generation, format standardization, and reference tracking.

tasks.title: Research Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Create research analytics dashboard with trend analysis, productivity metrics, and research insights visualization.

acceptance_criteria: Web scraping functional across diverse content types
Academic database APIs integrated and operational
Source validation system accurately assessing credibility
Automated archiving preserving all research materials
Performance benchmarks met under research load
